# Project Setup Assistant - Generated Files Summary

This document provides an overview of the specification files generated for the Gasthof Roschitzhof Digital Relaunch project.

- `specs/features/mobile-first-ux-navigation-spec.md`: Details the implementation of the mobile-first user experience, including 'Thumb Zone' navigation, performance optimizations, and dark mode support.
- `specs/pages/homepage-spec.md`: Specifies the structure, content, and interactive elements of the primary Homepage / Landing Page.
- `specs/flows/book-table-flow-spec.md`: Outlines the step-by-step user flow for booking a table at the Gasthof, from initiation to confirmation.
- `specs/collections/bookings-collection-spec.md`: Defines the data structure, fields, and relationships for the 'bookings' data collection, crucial for managing reservations.
